name: Data retention - 365 days -  DehCase
description:
'- Removes all cases which are older than 365 days. 
- Runs periodically (every XXX hours/weeks)
- Best practice is to enable this setting as well: Administration -> Settings -> Clean up deleted records = true/checked. If not, records will stay in the database with the column 'deleted' on 'true' and are therefore only soft-deleted.
- Best practice is to also remove related flowchart process records to save space for relevant data.
